document.full_text: the republican-dominated texas house late sunday passed a budget for the next two fiscal years that does not add taxes or dip into the state's rainy day fund but does make sweeping cuts to education and health care.
document.title: texas house approves budget that makes sweeping cuts
lines_and_colors: the republican-dominated texas house late sunday passed a budget for the next two fiscal years that does not add taxes or dip into the state's rainy day fund but does make sweeping cuts to education and health care.
